name: Unstable Cubes 1
description: Using grids, randomisation, and the blend mode ADD, i create a looping glitching effect for a series of squares.
background: It utilises the concept of chromatic abberation to emulate old glitching effects on videos

name: Unstable Cubes 2
description: Instead of looping, it now uses a mouseClicked function to create one field at a time

name: Unstable Cubes 3
description: Currently the same as version 2, but will eventually use perlin noise to distribute the glitches

name: Choose your Tower
description: Using functions to draw towers of randomly sized cubes, this program will display all of them for the user to look at and pick their favourite
